dcterms:creator: E. Learned-Miller
G. B. Huang
A. RoyChowdhury
H. Li
G. Hua
dcterms:description: The LFW dataset contains 13,233 face images collected from the web, covering a vast variety of pose variations and facial expressions. The authors used the original aligned images of size 250 × 250 pixels to create corresponding low-resolution images for their experiments.
dcterms:title: Labeled Faces in the Wild (LFW)

dcterms:creator: O. Jesorsky
K. J. Kirchberg
R. W. Frischholz
dcterms:description: The BioID dataset consists of 1,521 face images, with 1,028 images used for training and 493 for testing. The images are aligned and cropped to a size of 160 × 120 pixels for the experiments.
dcterms:title: BioID
